title: Can login, keep reconnecting client,connection timeout. OK in game. Weird?
body:
Hi there, 
Since last Friday, I am not available to enjoy LOL. I used to play LOL by using my vodafone 4G network because it's lightening speed.

But now I can login client, the weird thing is I keep lost connection and connection timeout  forever. I am sure my network is fine.

Now I can only use my home network to start a game, once started, I will change to vodafonr4G and it's fine.

Can anyone help me to solve this problem? Vodafone 4G can play lol in game smoothly but keep lost connection in client.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I would suggest contacting vodafone as it's possible they're currently experiencing issues on their network.

The real question here is why you would rather be using a 4g connection over your home connection, if your home connection works fine and is of adequate speed you should have no issues with the game.

Thanks for suggestion.

The only reason I use 4G rather than homenetwork it's because my wife and family always youtube facebook download whatever....

I cant survive with that high ping spike

If you're feeling up to the challenge and your router [supports DD-WRT](https://www.dd-wrt.com/site/support/router-database) then there's a neat little blog post [here](http://markmaunder.com/2011/01/26/how-to-reliably-limit-the-amount-of-bandwidth-your-room-mate-or-bad-office-colleague-uses/) about rate limiting others on your network.
